website_summaries.verdict: By far one of the most popular nail care sets, this duo manicure and pedicure machine provides excellent care all around.
pros: Includes seven different attachments, all coated in sapphire for ultimate results
Able to use in two speed settings
Built-in LED light allows you to see as you groom
Comes with a carrying case for storage
cons: Step-by-step instructions are not included with the set

customer_reviews.title: Bought it in May 2016 and used it a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in May 2016 and used it a few times. Took it out of the case at the end of August and the motor would not turn. That is failure in 90 days of ownership. Don't know about you but this item is not subject to heavy home use. How often do you do your nails? Twice a month? I need another nail appliance but will not be buying this one. I would return it but it is out of the return period. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley E Rulapaugh

customer_reviews.title: None of the bits are that useful.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this drill kit! I read all the reviews and felt confident it would do what I need it to do. Sadly, the drill bits are all the same as far as roughness goes. Nothing works very well to remove nails and nothing works to smooth the nails. So, I’m basically left with an expensive nail file. My $1 nail files work better than this. I would return it if I didn’t already through the packaging away. Instead, I’m stuck with a $60 nail drill that isn’t that useful.
customer_reviews.author: jcmar

customer_reviews.title: I have a battery operated that is better than this
customer_reviews.text: No power, I have a battery operated that is better than this one
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The older I get, the harder it gets to ...
customer_reviews.text: The older I get, the harder it gets to do my toenails. This device makes it easier. The unit feels solid and there are enough different attachments to do anything I need to do. My improvement wish would be re: the AC cord. Make it longer and lose the spring coil. You have to be really close to an AC outlet, and the spring coil reduces freedom of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to do my own manicure. The instructions are not clear enough for beginners anyway I figured out how it works trying all tools. It wasn't a big deal. The result is perfect. I really love it. My manicure looks professional. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erhan Atilla Avinal

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this manicure/pedicure system a couple weeks ago. I've used it a couple times and I really like it. I hate filing my nails or doing them in general so I was looking for an easier way to do that at home instead of spending $40+ at a nail salon (which I don't love sitting at every time either). This is perfect for that. It is easy to use, I have no experience doing nails. I can watch TV and do this at the same time. Filing is the best part, but also good for removing excess skin/hang nails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Shine or Instruction
customer_reviews.text: The buffer attachment does not buff my nails. Instructions on how to use all the attachments would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Salon results at home!!
customer_reviews.text: You know what? My husband purchased this online for me. Order #111-4212391-10 We celebrated our 41st this year!! When he told me he had ordered something on line, trust me, I was pretty worried. Usually it’s jewelry or some item I mentioned in passing when I saw someone with one or passed it in a store. Well, I can say after using it this morning I LOVE it!! As a matter of fact I will use it again later to do his nails. It is so easy to use. And I love how many attachments it has. It did a great job!! Can’t wait to use it more. Regards, Carol Worden
customer_reviews.author: Del & Carol Worden

customer_reviews.title: The Craig Family is very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: We have been enjoying this set so much. We got one for our daughter who has 2 girls and 1 4 year old boy. He fusses to have his nails cut, but loves to have his nails sanded with the set! The girls pay attention to their nails and shape them perfectly. I love to shape my nails and sand mine and my husband's toenails. It is very useful, efficient and Fun. Even our podiatrist said it's okay to use between visits. I am 64 years old, have been filing my nails for years so this set has been a great and useful gift I bought myself. I highly recommend it. The Craig Family.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Craig

customer_reviews.title: Simple, easy & safe!
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy those tools very much. Gifted myself this set for Christmas (aka Santa) and I use it is every other week to clean up my nails that I used to bite. It is easy and safe to use. Doesn’t hurt. Keep my nails, cuticles and nails bed free of the little skin that I used to pull. Now my nails and skin around are smooth. It is pleasant - no need to go to the salon. I like the different speed and heads. Very practical and I easy to travel with too. I am very pleased with the brand. I also own their high frequency « wand ». Another great product from them. Very happy with my purchase. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Virginie Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Does it all
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Why did I wait so long to replace the Medisana unit that has been shutting off intermittently for years? Love this PureNails unit. It has two speeds, rotates both clockwise and counter clockwise, has all of the heads you need for manicures and pedicures, including for removing calluses. It is wonderful and powerful and quiet. I am so pleased. Now I will keep my fingers and toes crossed that it lasts. I have had other brand manicure sets that started out well enough and then either quit altogether or started shutting down at inconvenient times. Oh, and the little light on this PureNails hand piece is bright enough to help you see your work area clearly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Comella

customer_reviews.title: Nail drill set
customer_reviews.text: This tool is awsome. I have had both kneens replaced and my leg don't bend very well so I can not us a clippers on my toenails without cutting a lot of skin. This tool lets me reach and it does a good job on my thick nails. I recommend this trimmer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Feels cheaply made and lacks power. I like the utilyze set it has 10 speed options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders and fast.
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget works wonders. I have rather thick big toe nails that curve in at the edges so it was impossible for me to get clippers on them. The course file ground them down within seconds. I have yet to use the other attachments but will over the weekend. Its sandal time and I want my feet to look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delilah's nail Therapy review
customer_reviews.text: Due to current conditions of the world every thing for me had turned upside down. Originally, I was in a school building teaching my wonderful students and then was thrusted into the world of online teaching. It was a struggle and my morale took a beating. However, my wonderful boyfriend decided to cheer me up with a self care package that included this Pure Enrichment nail drill set. Honestly it was a great edition to my new lifestyle and I couldn't live without it. Although I don't really go out much my hands and feet are always ready for the occasion. It's a reliable, well built, and beautiful tool that makes me feel beautiful too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hualoto

customer_reviews.title: Another as advertised product. Well done!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fifth or sixth Pure Enrichment product. It is a TREMENDOUS value for the money. Their products seem, feel and act like much more expensive competitors. The customer service is second to none. Keep up the good work Pure! Your products are fairly priced and very dependable. I always find these products to be “as advertised” and fit our lifestyle. We own a 90 acre farm in Georgia with a 40’ Luxury Fifth Wheel Camper. You have products for every
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Not happen with product
customer_reviews.text: Nails were very rough and Rigid from Wearing acrylic for many years, so I order to help smooth my nail bed so I can apply regular polish on my nails. Was very disappointed that my nails looked no different then when I used my nail file. Would not recommend this if you have been wearing acrylic for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mani-pedi kit! I love the LED light, reverse mode, the tidy storage box, just everything. This is the third dremel tool I have purchased for my difficult, tough toenails. My father passed on to me some awful nail fungus he got in the navy cleaning up after the Pearl Harbor bombing. I use this to thin my toenails once a week and keep them almost "normal" looking and avoid them getting curled and ingrown. I bought this as a birthday gift for myself in 2018 and I am so pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous vetran

customer_reviews.title: Keep away from acetone or it will literally "melt" away
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful, does not sufficiently smooth nails. A cotton ball with acetone and red polish came in contact with the shaft and spotted it. Trying to clean it up with another cotton ball with acetone, the lacquer totally dissolved, left me with glue-like sticky hands and a shaft stripped of its finish. Might do the the job as long as you keep it far from acetone which is, however, essential for a manicure.
customer_reviews.author: phg

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I purchased this unit, I mean how much better could this be than my manual manicure tools? What a difference this kit makes, my nails have never looked better. Have used it several time on fingers and toes and it really works great. It has the right amount of power for me; since it's electric there is no stalling or slowing down. The tips do everything I need. The directions are easy to read and understand. The unit was easy for me to use the first time. If it appeals I would recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Tikasmom

customer_reviews.title: It makes it look like the nail is longer than it is
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the battery operated one I had before. This runs very fast even on slow, and does not have grit on the sides. You can shorten nails quickly but I need to either use my battery operated one to shape and smooth my nails, or a hand nail file. I find the light an annoyance. It makes it look like the nail is longer than it is, and thus gets too close to the quick.
customer_reviews.author: AZSenior

customer_reviews.title: Do your nails at home!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product very easy to use. I started off using the lowest power setting until I got comfortable with the controls. I like that there are lots of attachments so that I can pick what I need in the moment. It charges quickly as well. Since we are still sheltering in place this kit has been essential in helping me maintain my nails.
customer_reviews.author: Mo B

customer_reviews.title: NOT a nail buffer
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a skin and nail file. It does absolutely nothing to buff your nails, which was why I bought it. I have returned it and will be looking for a buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-Student

customer_reviews.title: Instant Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, damaged toenails from too much running in my younger years and now diabetes. A few nails want to go ingrown, and they are impossibly painful to cut. This product worked wonders. I was able to grind down the thickness in minutes which greatly reduced the pressure and soreness after just one use. Totally worth the cost. I'm just sorry I waited so long to purchase it!
customer_reviews.author: tkm

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but gentle, easy to keep nails looking great!
customer_reviews.text: We have had the smaller Pure manicure pedicure kit for some time so wanted to replace the tools that came with it. But when the refill tolls came they were heavier and didn’t fit. So while exploring options I find this item. Happily! This outfit is fantastic. It even has a light on the end so you can see what you are doing. Comes in a neat zippered case and is a plug in rather than AA batteries. Much more powerful and more effective. So happy we ended up getting this model!
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great product for problem toenails!!
customer_reviews.text: This product delivered as a great tool for pedicures! It came in a nicely organized case and had even more attachments than I actually needed! The ones I use work great in removing the thickening of my nails and trimming them down, something my ordinary toenail clippers could no longer do. My nails haven't looked this good for a long time! The product is easy to use, has variable adjustments, and provides good instructions. It appears to be of high quality in manufacture and I intend to use it in years to come. Hopefully I'll never have to see the podiatrist now that I have this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, may return
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality drill, most of the attachments work well. However, I’m really upset that the smoothing/polishing attachment does NOT work at all. It will make your nail a little smoother but it’s almost unnoticeable. I was really excited about this and spent more money than I wanted to hoping I’d get a better product. I’m considering returning it
customer_reviews.author: alayna

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling but not so great for removing gel nail polish on acrylic nails!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to quarantine, all nail salons were closed and I really needed a drill to remove my previous nail gel polish that was hanging on for dear life. It took me hours to remove gel polish from just one nail that I gave up and ordered a more expensive drill. I did not return it because I loved how it came with different tools to file, buff and it comes with a light that allows you to focus on the area. It is also great for traveling, but I would not recommend this if you need to remove gel nail polish on acrylic nails. The drill is not strong enough to do it or at least that was my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Professional Manicure and Pedicure Kit - Electric Nail File Set for Salon-Quality Grooming at Home
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new pure enrichment purenails professional manicure & pedicure set yesterday and it is amazing. I am a diabetic with severe bilateral carpal and arthritis in both hands and feet and it was an awesome experience for me that i ever had in my life. My nails are new perfect and soft! This was the best decision i ever made and saved my 100's of dollars a month and getting manicure and pedicures. Thank you so much i love this set! Highly recommended! I already told many of my family, coworkers and friends and this product! I get it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! 100% RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product because it's very handy and easy to use. Not only that but is very safe in terms of anyone with or without experience in nails could use it. It comes with different drill attachments as well as different speeds which makes it so manageable. Overall, I think this product is really great, works perfectly, and has a reasonable price as well. I would recommend this product to anyone that is interested in doing their manicure/pedicure at home with a professional finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took off my gel nails quickly and easily!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today and immediately used it for at least an hour to remove gel nails. It works great and is very easy to use. Everything seems very durable. It is pretty powerful. The only reason it took so long to perform the task was that my left hand is not used to such fine motor tasks. Now that the gel nails are gone, I plan to use it to remove and prep for gel polish. When I opened the box and saw that it was only two speeds, I was concerned but it works out quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E Kleiman

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for saving my nails!
customer_reviews.text: My pure nails manicure yet is so easy to use and has allowed me to keep up with my nail hygiene during the pandemic when salons were closed. Having kids doesn’t leave much time for primping but this has been a lifesaver and I’ll never go back to file sticks again​
customer_reviews.author: E. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: The device is easy to use. It is efficient in trimming toenails as well as fingernails. A delight to have something that works well. I do wish that it was battery charged, as it is a little awkward to plug it into the wall and find a comfortable seating arrangement for the pedicure.
customer_reviews.author: Mariella Bowman

customer_reviews.title: the power is bad and I should have realized that the replacement pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: It works okay if you don't rely on this to remove all your nail polish/powder but rather to just shave off the last bit of it. Otherwise, the power is bad and I should have realized that the replacement pieces wouldn't be easily accessible or cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Might be good for very minimal filing but not good for any ...
customer_reviews.text: Might be good for very minimal filing but not good for any thing else. The tips have a tendency to come off while you're using it. I wouldn't call this professional quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: easy to use for nonprofessional
customer_reviews.text: Hello , I have been using PureNails 7-piece Professional Manicure & Pedicure System a month. I like how quick and easy it is to do myself a manicure and a pedicure. It is very compact and pretty powerful. It is also make my boyfriend nails looks better, cause it is easy to polish them with that kit. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Irina Perukhina

customer_reviews.title: No more salon appointments
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! The light makes the work easier, and the tools are easy to use, after some practice. Best of all - No sharp edges! At the salon I was getting cut every other visit. Now it is easy to do my toenails and fingernails myself - no blood!
customer_reviews.author: Daisymsg

customer_reviews.title: Basic at best
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see anything significantly different. The cord isn’t that long, and it easily unattaches from the wall, which makes it a bit difficult to use. The 2 speeds are not that different from other comparable items. At this price, I say shop around for a less expensive and cordless one. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jose colmenero Jr

customer_reviews.title: Solves the Old Man's Problem
customer_reviews.text: Uses house current for consistent rpm's. The cord is long enough. The included bits do the job of keeping the more difficult nails trimmed. Nicely packaged. Comes in a zippered case for traveling. Wear a paper mask to avoid inhaling dust generated. Do trimming on top of a disposable or washable surface so nail dust isn't spread.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional nail care in the comfort of home
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this nail care kit. I have poor dexterity but have no trouble using the product. Very user friendly and does beautiful job on hands and feet. Will strongly recommend this kit to friends and relatives, especially those with arthritis. I am very appreciative of quality and design. Thank you for a very nice product. Powerful but gentle!
customer_reviews.author: RaySing4Carrots

customer_reviews.title: Item looks it it was used before
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product. I’m nervous to try it because it looks like it could of been a return and was resold. Doesn’t look new.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: No power dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This item is useless. I bought it for my cuticles and acrylic nails to do at home. It is basically useless and you are better off using a nail file from a drug store. Doesnt work on cuticles doesnt work on nails doesnt work on callous.
customer_reviews.author: Beep boop

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved this manicure set but I broke after 1. 1/2 years .
customer_reviews.author: Tzukitty

customer_reviews.title: Good for fingers and toes
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product and worked on calluses as well as thickened nail ridges providing smoother skin and nails. My only suggestion would be to have a high, medium, and low setting. The low setting is strong and one more lower setting would help with more delicate/tender areas.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, but it works very well...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a higher rating if the unit wasn't so noisy. Other than that, the device works very well. I play fingerstyle guitar, so I need to keep my nails trimmed to the right length and shape. The PureNails does the job very efficiently and much faster than doing it the old fashion way.
customer_reviews.author: road66warrior

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a kit since nail salons are closed. This is great! my nails look professional and I've never done them myself before. I used the dipped kit and with this set, perfect! I may not go back to the salon again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Nail Salon
customer_reviews.text: With COVID changing our lives I was really happy with this product. It was so easy to use and works very well... so well I bought from my mom and sister... crazy how much peace of mind this gives me -thank you so much! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: jamal morson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: he pure enrichment manicure set is one of my best purchases of 2020! I absolutely love this product because it takes care of all my foot care needs. I have never owned a nail care kit that has worked this well. As registered nurse I understand how important foot care is in preventing health related complications. This product has allowed me to perform foot care on my diabetic parents effortlessly. I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Razo

customer_reviews.title: Pure Nails for Manicure and Pedicure I love. This is so good to me and easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure Nails for Manicure and Pedicure I love. This is so good to me and easy work. Work so smooth and have AC adapter and sapphire attachment. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at-Home Use
customer_reviews.text: This manicure kit is perfect, especially during a time where many nail salons are closed as we are socially distancing. I found it on your amazon page as we have purchased some of your other products like air purifiers and humidifiers and noticed it is very similar to the tools my nail salon uses for manicures and pedicures. This manicure kit allows me to stay on top of my nail (and foot) care between appointments and is so easy to use. Thank you for creating this product for at-home use!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Leskar

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I only have two complaints: (1) the light is too focused and casts shadows and (2) the attachments are not well explained in the manual and I am not sure how to properly use them all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works great. My husband has atrocious looking toe nails and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My husband has atrocious looking toe nails and I can't get him to go to a pedicure salon so I have to do this myself at home. I bought this, used it yesterday and even though I still have a lot to do with his nails, I can already see that I am going to be able to make a difference because of Purenails and that makes me happy. It is very easy to use and the case that it has for the equipment is very handy too. Love it, thank you. .
customer_reviews.author: Dubbledutch

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just receive my Pure Nails 7 pcs Professional Manicure and Pedicure System.. I was happy to purchase this item because I am always doing the nails of me and my husbands foot. I don't need to go to the nail salon which cost a lot of money and you are not happy for the services that they made. I will buy 2 more of these to give to my sisters on Christmas day. I will rate this product "5" for excellent Maria Paz J Parker
customer_reviews.author: Maria Paz Jose-Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased PureNails 7-piece Professional Manicure and Pedicure System on January 8, 2016. We got this pedicure system for our dad who has diabetes and needs to take care of his feet all the time. He really loved it and it's easy to use. It does what it supposed to do and the price is good too! It would be great if additional and replacement bits were on the market. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir_K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for novice drillers!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a nail tech and like most ladies, I had gel on my nails that I needed to soak off and needed a manicure. I LOVE the light feature on this drill. I did not give 5 stars because there is no information on how to order replacement parts/buffers or sanding blocks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Exactly as described! VERY pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly as described! VERY pleased! Much better than the battery-powered unit, since this unit has the power to go very fast, so you get a clean smooth edge very quickly and it doesn't run out of power.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my Mother's Christmas present. She was happy with the look of the product and carrying case. She was impressed with the quality of the attachments included and loved that the product lights the area she was working on. Previously, she owed manicure sets that are battery operated and was unhappy with the power of those units. She thinks it is awesome that this unit plugs in and won't lose power or give inconsistent results.
customer_reviews.author: J GAR

customer_reviews.title: Really neat kit.
customer_reviews.text: During this time of staying home to stay safe, I decided I needed to get a kit to help me give myself a pedicure. This kit is perfect as it has different file heads that have helped me make my nails look much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Lipson

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and comes in a nice storage bag, deducted a star due to the fact that when using the filing tips they kinda shimmy themselves lose and fall out which hurts and the light is in an odd spot so its pretty useless but the product itself has the power and does what it's intended to do
customer_reviews.author: michal

customer_reviews.title: The perfect tool for manicures/pedicures at home!
customer_reviews.text: The drill came in right away. The packaging is great and the drill bits fill my needs--from cuticle removal to large calluses. The drill charges easily and the charge lasts a long time. I use it for myself, my mother, and my husband's pedicures with no complaints about painful drill burns. I highly recommend this drill for anyone who is tired of paying the high prices for salon nail services!
customer_reviews.author: Delores A. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Easy Diabetic foot care
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! As a diabetic I have to be very careful with my feet. This makes shortening my nails and removing callouses easy. I am sorry I didn’t find it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Skipp

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Nail Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful nail grooming set. I’ve had it for two years and really like being able to do my own toes. I recently had an issue with one of the tools popping out of the unit and the company is sending me a new unit. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Citywoman33

customer_reviews.title: Hands-down the best Manicure set I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: The PureNails 7-piece Professional Manicure & Pedicure System is hands-down the best Manicure set I have ever owned. I liked the coil cord and grooming light too. The handle is the perfect size for my hands comfort and perfect weight. The manicure set works perfectly and has been a tremendous help for me taking care of my fingernails and toenails.
customer_reviews.author: S. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Does it really works?
customer_reviews.text: This item worked for me. I Bought it for my personal use at home. I liked that, it did the job that I wanted it to do and it did it fast without leaving a mess. It files and reduces dead skin on nails, callus and on the back of the heels , leaving the area smooth. For the price that I paid for it, I think that it is a good instrument to have for home.
customer_reviews.author: Socorro

customer_reviews.title: PureNails better than my Professional set
customer_reviews.text: You can now do professional level pedi-mani's in record time safely. The light is most helpful and I was able to trim toenails to encourage correct growth, remove calluses or dry skin easily. The heads perfectly fit in pen-like tool which you effortlessly switch out to file down, debride, buff or detail for fantastic results. Beautiful case for efficient storing. Makes great gift.
customer_reviews.author: I.Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i love it ! We regularly go to our local nails salon to constantly correct some nail issues and satisfy our vanities. Though it is heavy to our wallets, it is part of our monthly budget. After a lot of research in an effort to save money and not being able to get service due to the pandemic, we found this product at amazon. And boy! What a great find. It does the job of a nails salon but without the extra expenses. You got a follower. Thank you Pure!
customer_reviews.author: Lomatiq

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gift
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality of your product. Works well and easy to use. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for doing your nails at home - and costs less than one visit to the manicurist, and you can use it over and over and over again! Pays for itself in no time! Only took me 2 or 3 times before my manicure was coming out salon perfect every time!
customer_reviews.author: CoolyCoolMojoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable Manicure Set
customer_reviews.text: The manicure set is as described. It comes in a nice travel/storage case. Since we are all sheltering in place I have been unable to have my thick nails ground down. I like that it has a rechargeable battery as opposed to an electrical wire which must be plugged in. I have only used the kit once so far it seems that it will be just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: PAPARAIN

customer_reviews.title: By Barbara R. on December 23, 2015
customer_reviews.text: Dear PureNails, I purchased the PureNails 7-Piece Manicure/Pedicure Set SKU PENAILSET on 11-30-15 on Amazon.com (Order # 115-5904617-413-7027). This is a wonderful high quality product that performs exceptionally well. From nail care to callus remover, this kit gives me a professional manicure and pedicure at home. It's easy to use and instructions are easy to understand. I would give it 5 stars. I am looking forward to trying my free 7-piece Manicure Kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. What I had needed, and what I use it for, is to regularly buff the roughened skin around the tips of my fingernails. It is very effective, efficient, and comfortable to use. It seems to be a very good and well-made product. I like it a lot. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and gentle on my fingernails!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality, the product, the feel and how gentle it is on my nails. Usually the ones used at salons hurt me and tear into my skin, but this one is so smooth and leaves my nails perfect! I am just so in love with this! The fact that it comes in a case is a super bonus! I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a manicure or try using it with gel nails, which is what I use it for. The price was a little high, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingmom

customer_reviews.title: A super investment!
customer_reviews.text: This product does everything it says it will do. In just a few minutes of use I got salon quality nails and baby soft feet. In just one use I realized this product will become an essential tool in my personal hygiene. Very simple and easy to use. I'm not sure the light is super helpful and wouldn't make that a determining factor in purchasing this model. I am glad I purchased the one with a cord and not the one that takes batteries. I feel this tool is powerful and I like being able to run it as long as I want and not worry I'm going to run out of power before I'm finished.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This manicure set works great.Love that it plugs in. Takes a little time to get used to. But i really love it and works!
customer_reviews.author: Penny L.

customer_reviews.title: PureNails 7-piece Professional Manicure set works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used PureNails a few times, and it works great! It's well made, and preforms. I have senior toenails (born 1947) and they had become a pain to cut/trim. They were thick, and curved, and sometimes slightly in-grown. What took 15-20 minutes before, now takes 5-8 minutes, with no bleeding. This tool is easy to use. Just follow the well written instructions. I'm happy with it, and I don't dread trimming my nails anymore. Vince B.
customer_reviews.author: Vince B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for very hard nail or toe nails .. Grateful for this tool to do my moms nails . She is 85 years old and wow ! this saved me hours from filing the old fashions way . Thank u
customer_reviews.author: Godlee LLC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised and easy to use. It had two manuals and at first, I thought I received an incorrect item because of it. I like that it came in a bag to store the machine and drills. I like that it had a light but it was not so useful because it did not light properly of where I was working on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Nail Drill Kit
customer_reviews.text: I have never had to do my nails before. I found this very easy to use especially as I was removing Gel Polish. My nails look nice and I found it to be very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, product had to be returned. The adapter ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, product had to be returned. The adapter cord simply would not fit in the receptor no matter how much pressure was applied. I was really excited about using this product - Perhaps the wrong electrical adapter was sent
customer_reviews.author: Dee J.

customer_reviews.title: Twas a delight, yee nail perfector
customer_reviews.text: The PureNails kit worked well! I do wish there was a finer nail sander to use on natural nails, but it worked well buffing them and cleaning up around the nailbed. I look forward to using the shaping kit again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updating my review.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted the manufacturer on May 8th via email. They replaced my unit because it was still under the manufacturer 2 year warranty. New unit arrived May 11th. Super impressed with the customer service and the Company standing behind their product. Thanks!!! Original review: Loved this product and was perfect for doing my nails at home instead of the salon. Purchased April 6th and used 3 times. Used today, May 7th and it stopped working. My warranty return period ended YESTERDAY on May 6th. That stinks!!!!! Too expensive to only use 3 times and it stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Aliemer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nail drill
customer_reviews.text: Comparing my previous nail drill from another brand to this one, I would say that this is so much better, the quality and its features. With this one it takes me less time to do my nails and it works faster and with more precision. I would definitely recommend it. I love that it has the small led light as guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: Everything they say it does and more. Just like a professional salon tool which I wanted to avoid my weekly salon visits. I used it to remove gel nail polish, it’s fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Depetro

customer_reviews.title: Best Mani/Pedi Set
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely a 100% satisfied customer. I love the fact this product is rechargeable, has 3 speed settings, and comes w/ a built in light. Very easy on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use and provides great results!
customer_reviews.text: This manicure and pedicure set is excellent. It’s easy to use and provides great results!
customer_reviews.author: Helene M. Spoto

customer_reviews.title: Great nail drill set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Purenails based on the reviews and research due to Shelter in Place. This little machine is powerful and does the job. It comes with a travel case, which is great for vacations. I highly recommend that you add Purenails to your manicure/pedicure selection.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you do your own nails
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product back in February and wanted to give it a real try before posting a review. I love this nail drill. I do my own nails and always have trouble with the cuticles and skin around the rest of my nail. I pick at it and even bite it...then it tears and I am left with open wounds that take forever to heal. With the PureNails nail drill I don't have that problem. The smaller tips gently file away the skin around the nail without causing damage to the nail. It is also a perfect buffer for the ridges that form on my nails. Overall, I love the product and would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Raina Peneton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I received my Purenails Luxe Rechargeable manicure set today. With the closing of all manicure shops during COVID-19 I decided I needed a way to take care of my pedicures myself. This tool was more than I could have hoped for and made it easy. Thank you for such a great product. Easy to use and just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jekwalk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home mani/pedi set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a birthday gift and love it! It's a lot of fun to use and also really easy. The case it comes in is really handy and it has many different attachments which makes it versatile for all kinds of manicure needs. I especially loved it for my toes which are harder for me to file with a simple emery board. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wrecking Crew Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great 5 start bc the instructions are so tiny you can barely see especially how they describe each bit wait what ?
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: I have toe fungus that will not go away. At this point the only thing I can do is manage it. The big toes have thick nails and look awful. This is the best product out there to file the toenails down. It is easy to use and effective. I also use it for both hand a feet nails to keep them filed and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Anderson

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I received my order on February 23 and have used it twice for a pedicure. It is a very good product – easy to use. I like that it plugs in so I don’t have to worry about the batteries running down in the middle of a pedicure or manicure. I would purchase it again. It makes it easier to reach my toes. I also like that it has a variety of tips. At $30 per pedicure, it quickly pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: nc lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice drill
customer_reviews.text: Great for at home dip manicures. Haven't used it to take the nails off yet, Will update my review then. Easy to use, effective!
customer_reviews.author: Hey Honey

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it!!!! I have used it and it works great ! There are many attachments and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Book worm

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of this drill. I use it for my dipped nails and have done several sets before recharging. Others I’ve used needed to be charged each time. I also like all the different tips for different uses. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: uptunk

customer_reviews.title: Does what it advertises it will do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who does her own nails and feet on a regular basis and she absolutely loves the product. It also saves her from having to take the time to go to a salon to get the job done. She can do it right at home and get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Teig

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much, I bought a second set!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use on my Mom's thick toe nails. It made the job so much easier that I bought a second set for myself. Easy to use I especially like the callus removing bit. Pros: Excellent value for price. The built in light feature works well, overall functions greats. Cons: Would have liked more instructions on how to use each attachment or a link to tutorials: Being new to using nail grinders, I had to look up how to use the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: so at first i really did like the product, but as time passed the machine got weak and as I was filing my nails the bits would just fall off, also the light included isnt as helpful because of the location it is on so that was a fail. It is a good product but i personally just dont recommend if u want something that lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: removes the nail easy
customer_reviews.text: If u got time, lots of time, this product is slow , but does a nice job of removing the foot nail, Its good at making a smooth cut of the nails.
customer_reviews.author: vark

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit I bought. I was worried it would not be as powerful as the one the nail technicians use and I have found it to be very much the right amount of power. It is easy to use and makes quick work of filing acrylic / dip.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Valenta

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment PureNails 10-Piece Professional Manicure and Pedicure Kit - Electric Nail File Set for Salon-Quality Grooming at Home - 7 Nail Drill Bits, LED Grooming Light and Storage Bag
feature_bullets: 7 INTERCHANGEABLE ATTACHMENTS: Perfect for smoothing corns and calluses, removing excess cuticles, and filing, shaping and buffing nails at home - each one is made with premium, sapphire-coated metal for maximum performance and durability
TWO SPEED SETTINGS: Treat delicate areas like natural nails and cuticles on the low setting or groom acrylic nails and smooth calluses on the high setting
LED GROOMING LIGHT: Brighten your grooming area with the built-in LED light to achieve a precision manicure and pedicure
SPIRAL SPRING AC ADAPTER: Long-reaching AC adapter powers the electric nail drill so you never need to buy batteries

WHAT YOU GET: Electric nail drill, 7 drill attachments, AC power adapter, storage bag, industry-leading 5-Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide
